Ur assignments are generated & graded by an A.I. Can a video game make you more creative? Can a video game make you a better artist? Do you have what it takes to graduate from Art Sqool?



It makes the idea of practicing making art seem both inviting and worthwhile but still an incredibly weird undertaking.-Kotaku

The color choices are characteristically Glander: candy-like pinks and blues, everything effervescently joyful. Eagle-eyed art-nuts will love spotting references to the likes of Ed Ruscha and Yayoi Kusama, though we wonâ€™t give too many of those away.
-AIGA Eye on Design

Art Sqool will soon make all non-virtual art colleges redundant.-Rock Paper Shotgun
